Colophon

Site history

Sentimental futurist was created around August 2023, but I started tracking the changes in GitHub in October of that year. This is the second version of the site, and was launched on 23/04/2025.

Previously this website was shirubia.net; I'm fond of that name, but kinda got tired of it as it was too personal, too me. Sentimental futurist is a title that still speaks about the person, but it's a rather indistinct identity that makes me feel more confortable (if that makes sense).

Some technical information

  • Built with Eleventy and a lot of Sass
  • Hosted by Leprd ðŸ«¶
  • Domain registered on Porkbun
  • Coded in Pop!_OS using VS Codium (which is just like Visual Studio Code, but with no telemetry/tracking!)
